name: ecd-materials-generator
description: ECD Learning Materials Generator - Full Stack Application

scripts.stop: docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down && docker-compose down && for port in 3000 3001 5000 5001 5432 6379 8080; do lsof -ti:$port | xargs -r kill -9; done
scripts.setup: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps && cd ../template-studio && npm run setup
scripts.test: cd server && npm test && cd ../client && npm test

author: ECD Team
